document_data.name: Shey Chorten
document_data.mainbody: '''Shey Chorten''' was the name given to a section of the [[Katakoro Plateau]] where a large collection of burial mounds could be found.
document_data.Geography: Shey Chorten was located due west of the [[Glacier of the Lost King]]. The [[Old Caravan Road]] passed by to the south.
document_data.Description: The presence of so many burial mounds created a hilly section on the relatively flat Katakoro Plateau.
